name: Queen of Moths (TESSERACT GAMES)
description:
THE GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT. BY PURCHASING THIS VERSION, YOU WILL GET ACCESS TO ALL UPDATES AND THE FULL VERSION ON RELEASE.

It's a winter night. You are coming home by train. You have to change trains at a small train station in the middle of the forest.

It's not the first time you've traveled this route. But now you feel like something is different.

As if something was watching you.

Queen of Moth is horror/weird fiction game. It contains elements that are drastic and can cause fear or disgust.

Please click HERE if you want to check demo.
